# Oneurai AI Library ðŸ§ 

**Oneurai** is an all-in-one AI library designed to simplify the machine learning workflow. It replaces the need for managing multiple libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and PyTorch separately, offering a unified, easy-to-use API.

> "Code less, Train more."

---

## ðŸš€ Features
- **No NumPy required**: Pass standard Python lists directly.
- **Auto-Training Engine**: Forget complex training loops; just call `.train()`.
- **Hub Integration**: Push and pull models directly from [Oneurai.com](https://oneurai.com).
- **Production Ready**: One-line prediction and deployment.

---

## ðŸ“¦ Installation

```bash
pip install oneurai
